summary: THE FRAME CRACKED ON THE MOTORCYCLE.  MANUFACTURED BY WILD WEST MOTORS; MODEL: PEACE MAKER 2001.  THE MANUFACTURER REFERRED THE CONSUMER TO A MECHANIC IN HIS AREA FOR REPAIRS.  THE MANUFACTURER TOLD THE MECHANIC TO REPAIR THE FRAME BY WELDING IT TOGETHER.  FOR SAFETY REASONS THE MECHANIC DOESN'T AGREE WITH THE REPAIR METHOD BUT WILL REPAIR THE MOTORCYCLE.    *NLM  THE FRAME CRACKED SPRAYING OIL OUT*TS  *JB
